A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
They tried to make their own Guardians of the Galaxy.
Now they've failed at both doing that and doing a worthy Star Wars movie.
Furthermore\, the new trilogy is harmed beyond repair.
If I was J J Abrams\, I would step down from making Episode IX. 
They spit on his previous work\, now let them try to pull their heads out of the whole they've dug by themself.

Wait until this movie is up for (legal) streaming\, it's not worth the ticket.
